text: The Chicago International Documentary Film Festival (CIDF) is a festival of documentary films in the United States. The film event was established in 2003 and is dedicated to the celebration and cultivation of the documentary film. Over $50,000 in unrestricted cash plus other prizes are awarded by the jury. CIDF is presented by the Society for Arts. ==External links== *Homepage Category:Documentary film festivals in the United States Category:Film festivals in Chicago Category:Film festivals established in 2003
title: Chicago International Documentary Film Festival
